name: Fellowship of the Savior
description:

CRUSADE

.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-

Bless the Savior of Light!!!

Our fellowers long for the Savior's love, but we cannot blame them.

That is why they are leaving our bunker to preach the Word of the Savior to the whole world.

However, we need your support in these difficult times.

It is imperative that the will of the Savior be fulfilled.

Our base requires the working hands of every single man (and woman).

Only then the One will come!

Show them the ways of salvation and bring them back to our safe homeland.

.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-

GAMEPLAY

.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-

Mouse Button - Launch Holy Warhead 

FULLSCREEN REQUIRED!

Push your people back, but do not kill them  within the inner blast radius (red circle).

Fellowers at the edge of the blast will decide to come back to our praised bunker.

You win if  followers return.

You loose if followers run off or are you nuke them away. 

Difficulty affects winning/losing counts, speed and blast radius.
